1.80.0:
- Added "Translate text color" customization function, you can configure the text color of translation result in settings, thanks to **@wrk-123** for the contribution - Added "Skip code block or not" confirmation dialog box when translating, to avoid mis-translating the code content - Added Ctrl+Enter shortcut to submit code, thanks to **@wrk-123** for the contribution - Fixed the problem that ` ` line breaks are lost when converting MarkDown. `
` line breaks missing in MarkDown conversions, thanks to **@wrk-123** for contributing - Fix HTML escaping of characters when copying MarkDown (e.g., `<` `>`), thanks to **@wrk-123** for contributing - Fix line breaks in code blocks (` 
`) in MarkDown conversions, thanks to **@wrk-123* for contributing - Fix line breaks in MarkDown conversions, thanks to **@wrk-123* for contributing - Fix line breaks in code blocks (` `), thanks to **@wrk-123 * Contributions

- Fix for not filtering `
1.79.0:
- Removed dependency on Greasyfork script repository

- Changed default update source to AliCloud OSS

- Fixed issue with incorrectly styled buttons on some title pages

- Improvements: Adjusted GPT default prompts

- Improvements: Clear prompts when online code runs out of time
1.77.0:
- Add "Sample Test Result Checker" option

- Fix the issue that code block beautification doesn't switch theme correctly when dark mode is "Follow System"

- Fix the issue that "Review Status Text Replacement" doesn't replace correctly

- Fix the issue that Yodao translation is wrong

- Fix the issue that the translation result doesn't show up in comment reply section in segmented mode

- Fix the issue that the last comment is missing in the comment differentiation page

- Fix the issue that LaTeX color color is overwritten in dark mode - Fix the issue that waiting interval doesn't work in "Segmented translation" mode - Fix the issue when querying API balance. mode when LaTeX color is overwritten

- Fix the problem of waiting interval failure in "Segmented Translation" mode

- Fix the problem when querying API balance, thanks to **@x1uc** for the contribution

- Fix the problem of class name conflict in overlays

- Improve the rules of localization on the website, thanks to **@xiezheyuan**, **@Acfboy** for the contribution
